EmailTemplate.name: MBO Educational Resources.Thank You Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Affiliate}}, thank you for signing up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Affiliate}},
Thank you for signing up for the Coworking Connection. MBO Partners is proud to support your membership and programming efforts. We'll be sharing educational content with you to help your independent business owner members achieve career success.
To learn more about how the services MBO Partners provides can benefit your membership base, click here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com <mailto:ahaq@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
